code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const fetch_URI="https://api.weather.gov/gridpoints/SGX/53,20/forecast/hourly";const Weather=()=>{const[weatherData,setWeatherData]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{fetch(fetch_URI).then(res=>res.json()).then(body=>setWeatherData(body.properties.periods[0])).catch(()=>null);},[]);if(weatherData==null)return null;const{temperature,temperatureUnit,isDaytime,shortForecast,windSpeed,windDirection,relativeHumidity,probabilityOfPrecipitation,icon}=weatherData;const colorTheme=isDaytime?'bright':'dark';let timeEl=isDaytime?'It is Daytime':'It is Night time';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{"data-theme":colorTheme,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[temperature,"\xB0",temperatureUnit]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:shortForecast}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Wind speed: ",windSpeed," ",windDirection]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Humidity: ",relativeHumidity.value,"%"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Chance of rain: ",probabilityOfPrecipitation.value,"%"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:timeEl})]}),icon&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:icon.split(",")[0],alt:"Weather condition icon",style:{width:'100px',height:'100px',borderRadius:'1rem'}})]});};export default Weather;
